document.full_text: the bodies of 150 african refugees fleeing turmoil in libya have been recovered off the tunisian coast after the vessels carrying them illegally to europe got into difficulty, a u.n. official said friday.
document.title: tunisia finds 150 bodies from refugee vessels
lines_and_colors: the bodies of 150 african refugees fleeing turmoil in libya have been recovered off the tunisian coast after the vessels carrying them illegally to europe got into difficulty, a u.n. official said friday.
